articles.title: Mutation in Brain's Immune Cells Linked to Alzheimer's Risk - Neuroscience News
articles.description: A genetic mutation affecting microglia, the brain's immune cells, can increase the risk of Alzheimer's disease up to threefold.
articles.content:
